name: Disneyland Resort
description: The iconic theme park featuring Disneyland Park and Disney California Adventure Park, offering attractions, entertainment, and dining experiences.

name: Angel Stadium of Anaheim
description: Home of the Los Angeles Angels, hosting Major League Baseball games and events.

name: Anaheim Packing District
description: A vibrant food hall and marketplace featuring local vendors and eateries.

name: Honda Center
description: Home to the Anaheim Ducks and various concerts and events.

name: Anaheim Convention Center
description: The largest convention center on the West Coast, hosting numerous events and conventions.
